08 d7 63 f8 cf c0 00 00 03 01 01 00 //minimal IDAT block (1x1 red pixel)

0000 1000 //deflate algorithm (compression window 256)

11 0 10111 //LZ77 flags (no dict, max compression)

//data block
01100011 11111000 11001111 11000000 00000000 00000000
//reverse byte order
00000000 00000000 11000000 11001111 11111000 01100011
//convert bytes to codes
00000 0000000 00001100 00001100 111111111 00001100 011

//ADLER32 check
00000011 00000001 00000001 00000000




78 5e 63 f8 cf 00 45 58 99 00 8F 8E 08 f8

01111000 01011110 

01100011 11111000 11001111 00000000 01000101 01011000 10011001 00000000 
00000000 10011001 01011000 01000101 00000000 11001111 11111000 01100011
0000000010011001010110000100010100000000110011111111100001100011

0 0000000 10 01100 10 1011000 01000 1010000 00001100 111111111 00001100 011

0x00 0xff 0x00 0x00 @6-3 @20-10 #end

0x00 0xff 0x00 0x00 0xff 0x00 0x00 0xff 0x00 0x00 
0x00 0xff 0x00 0x00 0xff 0x00 0x00 0xff 0x00 0x00 
0x00 0xff 0x00 0x00 0xff 0x00 0x00 0xff 0x00 0x00 

10001111 10001110 00001000 11111000
